column4: My laptop (Sony Vaio VPC EB11FM) won't resume from a suspend.  It suspends fine, but when I wake it up...the thing boots up as if I had shut it off.  Does anyone know what might be causing it, or should I send a bug report?  (If so, what program should I use with ubuntu-bug?, thanks).
same here, vaio vgn. blank screen after resume.
I decided to live with no suspend option, there is whole bunch of threads for sony in launchpad, pity that most of them low level.
There is way to load manualy modules as fix
